mapper.select: SELECT ua.address_id AS shippingId, ua.recipient_name AS recipientName, ua.phone_number AS recipientPhone, ua.address_line1 || ' ' || ua.address_line2 AS recipientAddress, ua.postal_code AS postalCode, ua.detail_address AS detailAddress FROM user_addresses ua WHERE ua.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ua.is_default DESC, ua.address_id ASC
